response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the product's true worth of $1,000,000 to you. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways for your company. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
